p: The leafstalk length and leaf area of mile-a-minute were markedly less than those of sweet potato in all treatments (Table 1). In monoculture, the mean leafstalk length and leaf area of sweet potato were 17.18 cm and 101.25 cm 2, and the leafstalk length and leaf area of mile-a-minute were only 7.06 cm and 21.21 cm 2. In mixed culture, mile-a-minute leafstalk length averaged about half that of sweet potato at the highest ratio of mile-a-minute: sweet potato (3:1) and declined to less than one third of sweet potato leafstalk length at the 1:3 ratio. Likewise leaf area of mile-a-minute progressively declined with increasing proportions of sweet potato; even at the 1:3 sweet potato: mile-a-minute ratio, the leaf area of mile-a-minute was just one fifth of the leaf area of sweet potato.
